text: On uzakonil dlya vas tu blagochestivuyu deyatel'nost', kakaya byla zapovedana Noyu, kotoruyu My otkryli i tebe, kakuyu zapovedali My Avraamu, Moiseyu, Iisusu: "Bud'te postoyanny v etom blagochestii, i ne raskol'nichayte v nem!" Dlya mnogobozhnikov tak tyazhelo to, k chemu ty prizyvayesh' ikh! Bog izbirayet k nemu togo, kto khochet onogo, i vedet pryamo k nemu togo, kto okhotno obrashchayetsya k Nemu
